title: Zombie Hunters by Tj Lynn
description:
What circumstances are set into motion prior to a major outbreak?. 

Jana Jones is the head of the East Coast Division of the world's oldest known zombie and ghoul research center, know only as the society. She knows more about zombies than anyone on the planet as she has been studying them for decades. So far the society has been successful in creating a web throughout the United States that has kept society safe from a major outbreak. The only thing they have failed at is creating a successful anti-serum for the zombie virus, and the danger of a major outbreak is steadily increasing as the worlds wealthiest take an interest in the undead. What could possibly go wrong? 

This the authors first fiction story. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s a creepy, nail biting- edge of your seat kind of book! Book one of the Zomboligist Series takes you first into the year 1886 on one manÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s quest to find a cure for his infected wife then sweeps you into modern times to a society on the verge of a major zombie outbreak. 
Genre: Dystopian, Horror, Science Fiction & Fantasy
